# ApplePayValidateMerchantEvent

**Class**

An event object that contains the validation URL.

## Declaration

```swift
interface ApplePayValidateMerchantEvent
```

## Overview

The event handler [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/onvalidatemerchant] receives this event object when the payment sheet is displayed.

## Accessing the Merchant Validation Event Attributes

- **validationURL**: The URL your server must use to validate itself and obtain a merchant session object.

## Getting merchant validation

- **begin**: Begins the merchant validation process.
- **onvalidatemerchant**: An event handler the system calls when it displays the payment sheet.
- **completeMerchantValidation**: Completes the validation for a merchant session.
